nodes.title: Research Agent Best Practices
nodes.content: Research agents should verify information from multiple sources and provide citations.

nodes.title: Writer Agent Guidelines
nodes.content: Writer agents should structure content clearly and use appropriate language for the target audience.

nodes.title: Crew Collaboration Concept
nodes.content: Crews work best when agents have complementary skills and clear communication protocols.

nodes.title: Performance Optimization Facts
nodes.content: Tasks taking over 30 seconds often indicate inefficient tool usage or overly broad task descriptions.

nodes.title: Improvement for research_agent
nodes.content:
Agent research_agent needs improvement. Success rate: 20.0%

Actions:
- Review and enhance agent's goal and backstory
- Add more specific tools or knowledge sources
- Consider breaking complex tasks into smaller subtasks

nodes.title: Improvement for research_agent
nodes.content:
Agent research_agent has slow execution time: 59.0s average

Actions:
- Optimize task descriptions to be more specific
- Review and optimize tool usage
- Consider caching frequently accessed data

nodes.title: Performance Improvement: system_improvement
nodes.content:
Overall system success rate needs improvement: 24.0%

Recommended Actions:
- Implement better error handling and retry mechanisms
- Add validation steps between agent handoffs
- Consider adding a supervisor agent for complex workflows
